Operation 'commentanalyzer.comments.analyze' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Original description lacks critical details for AI agent decision-making. Missing: (1) empty summary - no concise action statement, (2) what attributes can be scored (toxicity mentioned in API description), (3) input structure (comment, context, attributes), (4) output structure (AttributeScores with per-span and summary scores), (5) important side effect (doNotStore flag for data deletion). Improved version provides complete context for AI agents to understand when and how to use this operation.

data.current_description: Analyzes the provided text and returns scores for requested attributes.
data.summary_suggestion: Analyze comment for toxicity and attribute scores
data.description_suggestion: Analyzes a comment to generate scores for requested attributes (e.g., toxicity). Accepts a comment text, optional context (such as an article or parent comment), and specified attributes to analyze. Returns AttributeScores for each requested attribute, including per-span scores and overall summary scores. Set the doNotStore flag to ensure the comment is automatically deleted after scoring.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks critical details for AI agent decision-making. Missing: (1) empty summary - no concise action statement, (2) what attributes can be scored (toxicity mentioned in API description), (3) input structure (comment, context, attributes), (4) output structure (AttributeScores with per-span and summary scores), (5) important side effect (doNotStore flag for data deletion). Improved version provides complete context for AI agents to understand when and how to use this operation.

message: Operation 'commentanalyzer.comments.suggestscore' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects, not_actionable. Original description is too vague and lacks actionability. Missing: (1) empty summary - no concise action statement, (2) unclear purpose - 'suggest scores as training data' doesn't explain the feedback/correction mechanism, (3) missing input details - what scores and metadata are expected, (4) missing output details - what does the response contain, (5) missing side effects - data is used for model training/improvement, (6) not actionable - doesn't clarify this is for correcting/improving model predictions. Improved version explains the feedback loop mechanism, inputs, outputs, and training data usage for better AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Suggest comment scores as training data.
data.summary_suggestion: Submit comment score corrections for model improvement
data.description_suggestion: Submits corrected or suggested scores for a comment to improve the Perspective model over time. Accepts a comment, suggested attribute scores, and optional client metadata. This operation enables users to provide feedback when they disagree with the model's analysis, helping to refine scoring accuracy. Submitted data is used as training data to enhance future model performance. Returns a response confirming the suggestion was received.
data.reasoning: Original description is too vague and lacks actionability.
